website_summaries.verdict: Dead Rising 2: Off The Record caters to series fans by adding more weapons, weapon combos, news levels, and a fresh sandbox mode, but the repetitive gameplay may deter others.
pros: Creative ways to combine weapons and dispatch enemies
New sandbox mode lets you bloody zombies without the story weighing you down

customer_reviews.title: An Improvement over the original
customer_reviews.text: Dead Rising 2: Off the Record follows up on Frank West, the protagonist of the original Dead Rising. The premise is still the same, a limited amount of time to uncover the truth behind the outbreak and survivors to rescue. Weapons can be combined to create powerful new ones. My favourite part is the sandbox mode, a free-roaming unlimited time mode where you can complete challenges and explore Fortune City. There is online multi-player, but no local multi-play.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: What more needs to be said when you can attach ...
customer_reviews.text: What more needs to be said when you can attach a few chainsaws to a broom handle, then that on a bike and ramming through hordes of the undead? Only if you can do so dressed as a half pig-half stripper photographer while escorting a drunk woman dressed as a mermaid. If you've played deasrising 2 there is little need to play this one, it has all the same weapons and only one new area.
customer_reviews.author: H2Flow

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice to experience a game thats very similar to the actual sequel to DR2!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting to play this game ever since it came out, and I've finally experienced for myself. the gameplay was nice, graphics were also. To me it's an alternate version of DR2, which is pretty cool! I've noticed a couple of glitches that I've found on another site that happen to occur sometimes, like a zombie falling out of the sky and them perfectly fine lol. Another weird one is I encountered not being able to attack with my weapon at the time, and Frank starts moving on his own. But besides all that it is an awesome game, and it is really fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: I like Deadrising Off the record better than the original deadrising 2. Off the record is a little bit better constructed than the original deadrising, and I love the camera feature that is brought back from deadrising 1. Off the record IS NOT A NEW DEADRISING it is just a little bit different from the original deadrising 2, new character,new places in the mall,new combo weapons,and new enemy`s to fight,and of course the camera feature. I would recommend this game to anyone who likes any of the deadrising games,its worth buying.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy Washington

customer_reviews.title: Fun, but Glitchy
customer_reviews.text: If you liked the first one, this is the same zombie smashing, hacking, bloody fun. Sadly, part way through several of the missions the game has frozen up and died. God, how I hate escort missions to begin with and having to repeat them has made the story mode unplayable. I bought it for the sandbox mode anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Stapry

customer_reviews.title: same game different name
customer_reviews.text: Wow same game...with a few tweaks. I like the original compared to this one, but that's me. It has a sandbox mode which is cool. Not worth it should have been DLC instead of whole new game
customer_reviews.author: Meddersman

customer_reviews.title: Worth Playing
customer_reviews.text: I for one have never played Dead Rising 2, but I have played DR1, DR: Case Zero, and DR: Case West. I love the series and I really enjoyed playing this game. I have heard that it is the same exact game as DR2, but if you haven't played DR2 then I recommend you buy DR2: OTR.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Solid edition
customer_reviews.text: Essentially the exact same game as the original Dead Rising Two, the only difference is that you are Frank West. You still have to use Zombrex every 24 hours, but the difference is you don't have to be at the safe house to do it. Otherwise the game is identical with a slightly different plot.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor L. Chaney

customer_reviews.title: Not ok
customer_reviews.text: Scratch so badly that was a disappointment as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: tedious
customer_reviews.text: A bit boring for me. If you like killing zombies for hours then this is great. I need a little more diversity. Especially if you already played dead rising 2. If your really into the story and the game mechanics its great. Otherwise I don't know if its worth a whole other game.
customer_reviews.author: Travis Scholl

customer_reviews.title: Boring after awhile
customer_reviews.text: Boring after awhile, and every single boss in this game is just annoying because of how many hits they take and how long it takes you to kill them. You WILL get frustrated with that.
customer_reviews.author: Olm W.

customer_reviews.title: great game!
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot more ways to kill zombies in this game than in the previous games. Awesome graphics! They brought back the original character, which is cool! You're gonna love it if you're a zombie gamer!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Y

customer_reviews.title: he loves it
customer_reviews.text: My niece received this as a gift from me. He loves it
customer_reviews.author: Prime2007

customer_reviews.title: more dead rising 2 baby
customer_reviews.text: if you loved dead rising 2 then watch out cause more is coming at you!!! but now you get to play as frank west :p it has some new areas and some new weapons..overall its a great game . so why are you not buying it yet?????
customer_reviews.author: Prophet

customer_reviews.title: Hours of Fun
customer_reviews.text: Game arrived in perfect condition and on time. I've wasted tons of hours so far and a couple of obligations from playing so that means a great buy. Now time to order Deadrising 3 which looks out of this world bad ass.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery Guidry

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Dead Rising is awesome capcom needs to put out a collection for the Xbone
customer_reviews.author: Zakkary Wages

customer_reviews.title: My son LOVED this game!
customer_reviews.text: A really good game for a zombie enthusiast. My son spent hours beating the story mode, and still picks it up from time to time for a free for all mode, which is saying alot.
customer_reviews.author: opalness

customer_reviews.title: Arrived sooner than stated. Perfect for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: As described online. Package arrived quickly. I do not play this but haven't heard any grumbles from my son so he must be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jaime O.

customer_reviews.title: cool
customer_reviews.text: Fun Game to kill time,pun something or other. on time delivery. Safely packaged. Satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great~
customer_reviews.text: I have Dead Rising 1 and 2, and I was curious on how Dead Rising 2 would play out. So far, I absolutely LOVE it
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wade

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good "Re-quel"
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit, I was a little worried that this game was just Dead Rising 2 with Frank instead of Chuck, but there were enough twists and turns to make this worth multiple playthroughs.
customer_reviews.author: Woody Myers

customer_reviews.title: DR.2 OTR
customer_reviews.text: If you didnt play DR.2 then your good this one is the same only has more stuff and even though it says it has a different storydont let capcom lie to you it really doesnt. still a fun game
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: dead rising 2 OTR
customer_reviews.text: This was a really fun game that was worth the price, if you've played a dead rising game before you will like this one and if not, its not to late to get into the series
customer_reviews.author: kcl

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: I spent a whole week playing this game with a friend so Its worth the 20 bucks its a great game
customer_reviews.author: Officer Foxy

customer_reviews.title: he loves this game
customer_reviews.text: this was one of the hard to find games that my man looked for for a long time he was happy to get this one under the tree.He has the other two in the series and is glad to now have the whole collection.
customer_reviews.author: Charity A Cihos

customer_reviews.title: I'd say go for it
customer_reviews.text: Hello random Amazon shopper. Looking for an older game, that CLAIMS new, but really isn't? Well look somewhere else. Amazingly, the game was actually new. (Nonoriginal shrinkwrap of course) but I peeled of the xbox sticker on the side, and sure enough it was a new game. Will test for issues but as is it's worth the 5. Good job guys.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Superlative
customer_reviews.text: One word to describe this game: FANTASTIC! Kudos to Capcom for developing a sequel better than the previous version. Highly entertaining.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Marriott

customer_reviews.title: Yayaz
customer_reviews.text: Wow such funs amazing you kill zombies with dildos :) best part in my opinion. I also loved frank with his personality and such
customer_reviews.author: eric tootill

customer_reviews.title: my son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son is 12 years old and loves this game. I personally have never played it. but he is happy
customer_reviews.author: adamax

customer_reviews.title: Bleh
customer_reviews.text: I bought Dead Rising 2:OTR because I loved Dead Rising 2. After playing through this installment featuring Dead Rising 1's lead character Frank West. I recommend players just skip this game entirely. Frank West is a character that brings down the entire game. He is slow and annoying to control even after upgrades and his stupid story line offers a sub par experience.
customer_reviews.author: Allen Saunders

customer_reviews.title: Very disapointed
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting a different game, not the exact same game as Dead Rising 2. All the psychos, all the people you need to save, everthing is the same. I probably should have paid closer attention to what the game was, however it was a horrible waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Wasted money!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a brand new game. Checked my order over and over--I wasn't wrong in the order. But I was sent a used game. It works and everything, but I feel cheated that they sent me a used game for the price about a new game. When I contacted them, they said that they will refund it if I send it back. They did not offer to replace it if I sent it back--which is what I expected--but no.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey Bucklew

product_meta.title: Dead Rising 2: Off the Record - Xbox 360
product_meta.description:
Platform:Xbox 360Dead Rising 2: Off the Record, sees photojournalist and original hero of Dead Rising's Willamette incident, Frank West take center stage as players experience a reimagining of the Fortune City outbreak. Forget what you know about Dead Rising 2,"Frank West is back in the game!" The new, "Off the Record" storyline means an all new Dead Rising 2 experience. Frank will face off against more twisted enemies, build more outrageous combo weapons, follow his own unique mission structure and explore brand new areas of Fortune City to get his biggest scoop yet. Frank's come back means the return of his trusty camera, with players able to earn Prestige Points (PP) for specific photo opportunities that are graded against criteria such as horror, drama, erotica and brutality. In addition to the new scenario and gameplay enhancements, Dead Rising 2: Off the Record offers a suite of technical updates including load time optimizations, improved network performance and a host of system upgrades to deliver a more satisfying Dead Rising experience.

AMAZON.COM



 Dead Rising 2: Off The Record is a reimaging of the zombie outbreak in the third-person Action game Dead Rising 2, this time featuring the original series protagonist, Frank West. The overall scenarios unleashed on the game world parallel those of the original release, but with the return of Frank West, the series also returns to the more lighthearted tone of story and gameplay. The game features: new missions, enemies, weapons combos and items / vehicles, a Sandbox Mode designed for exploration, co-op gameplay and Prestige Points and missions leveraging Frank's photography skills. 



DEAD RISING 2 REIMAGINED FEATURING FRANK WEST
 Photojournalist and original hero of Dead Rising's Willamette incident, Frank West takes center stage once again in Dead Rising 2: Off the Record. Forget what you know about Dead Rising 2, as players will experience a reimagining of the Fortune City outbreak. The new Off the Record storyline means an all new Dead Rising 2 experience. 



Frank West returns in a reimagining of the Dead Rising 2 experience.
View larger. 



A return to a lighter gameplay tone.
View larger. 

 Frank will face off against more twisted enemies, build more outrageous combo weapons, follow his own unique mission structure and explore brand-new areas of Fortune City to get his biggest scoop yet. Join Frank as he indulges in the insanity of "Uranus Zone," Fortune City's very own theme park. Full of deadly rides and crazy attractions, the sci-fi themed Uranus Zone is a true zombie-killing paradise. 

SANDBOX MODE, PRESTIGE POINTS AND MORE
 Fans have asked for it and now Dead Rising 2: Off the Record delivers a fully realized Sandbox Mode. Available from the outset and supporting both single and co-op modes, players can now explore all Fortune City has to offer without having to worry about the clock. In addition, Sandbox Mode offers a selection of gruesome and unique challenges such as 'Rumble in the Jungle,' 'Chop Suey' and 'Silver Strip Smackdown', all with online leaderboard support. Frank's comeback also means the return of his trusty camera, with players able to earn Prestige Points (PP) for specific photo opportunities that are graded against criteria such as horror, drama, erotica and brutality. In addition to the new scenario, Sandbox Mode and gameplay enhancements, Dead Rising 2: Off The Record offers a suite of technical updates including load time optimizations, improved network performance and a host of system upgrades to deliver a more satisfying Dead Rising experience. 

KEY GAME FEATURES
 * Fortune City, but not as You Know It - Experience a reinterpretation of the Fortune City outbreak through the eyes and camera of photojournalist Frank West  * New story and missions unique to Frank West
    * New environments including Fortune City's latest attraction, "Uranus Zone"
    * New enemies and more psychotic psychos
    * New crazy and hilarious combo-weapons
    * New items and vehicles
   
   
 * Do it Your Way - All new Sandbox Mode allows free rein exploration of Fortune City or the chance to top the leaderboards by competing in one of the many challenges
 * Frank West is Back - The original Dead Rising hero returns to get the scoop on the Fortune City outbreak
 * Say "Cheese!" - Capture those classic, violent, scary, hilarious Dead Rising moments, earn Prestige Points and complete all new missions with Frank's new and improved camera feature
 * Upgraded Experience - Full of technical improvements, system enhancements and feature upgrades to create a faster, smoother, more satisfying Dead Rising
 * 2-Player Co-Op - Co-op play allows players to invite their friends to partner up with them at any time to take on the zombie massacre - tag-team style

ADDITIONAL SCREENSHOTS

Frank West is back - The original Dead Rising hero returns to get the scoop on the Fortune City outbreak.
Say "Cheese!" - Capture those classic, violent, scary, hilarious Dead Rising moments, earn Prestige Points and complete all new missions with Frank's new and improved camera feature.
